trans-unit.source: Connect to and query your SQL Database with C#
trans-unit.target: Connect to and query your SQL Database with C#

trans-unit.source: Code sample for a C# client using ADO.NET to connect to and interact with the AdventureWorks database on the Azure SQL Database cloud service.
trans-unit.target: Code sample for a C# client using ADO.NET to connect to and interact with the AdventureWorks database on the Azure SQL Database cloud service.

trans-unit.source: This topic provides a C# code sample that shows you how to connect to an existing AdventureWorks SQL Database by using ADO.NET.
trans-unit.target: This topic provides a C# code sample that shows you how to connect to an existing AdventureWorks SQL Database by using ADO.NET.

trans-unit.source: The sample compiles to a console application that queries the database and displays the result set.
trans-unit.target: The sample compiles to a console application that queries the database and displays the result set.

trans-unit.source: An existing AdventureWorks database on Azure SQL Database.
trans-unit.target: An existing AdventureWorks database on Azure SQL Database.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Create one in minutes</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Create one in minutes</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Visual Studio with the .NET Framework</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Visual Studio with the .NET Framework</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: Create a C# console application using Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: Create a C# console application using Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Connect and query</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Connect and query</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Copy and paste the code sample below into your console application.
trans-unit.target: Copy and paste the code sample below into your console application.

trans-unit.source: The code sample is designed to be as short as possible to make it easy to understand.
trans-unit.target: The code sample is designed to be as short as possible to make it easy to understand.

trans-unit.source: The sample is not meant to be used in production.
trans-unit.target: The sample is not meant to be used in production.

trans-unit.source: This code is not meant for production.
trans-unit.target: This code is not meant for production.

trans-unit.source: If you would like to implement production ready code, the following are considered industry best practices:
trans-unit.target: If you would like to implement production ready code, the following are considered industry best practices:

trans-unit.source: Exception handling.
trans-unit.target: Exception handling.

trans-unit.source: Retry logic for transient errors.
trans-unit.target: Retry logic for transient errors.

trans-unit.source: Safe storage of passwords in a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Safe storage of passwords in a configuration file.

trans-unit.source: Paste this source code into your Program.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Paste this source code into your Program.cs file.

trans-unit.source: Open the <linkText>Azure preview portal</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: Open the <linkText>Azure preview portal</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Click Browse > SQL Databases > “Adventure Works” Database> Properties > Show Database Connection Strings.
trans-unit.target: Click Browse > SQL Databases > “Adventure Works” Database> Properties > Show Database Connection Strings.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Portal</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Portal</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the database connection strings blade, you can find the appropriate connection strings for ADO.NET, ODBC, PHP, and JDBC.
trans-unit.target: On the database connection strings blade, you can find the appropriate connection strings for ADO.NET, ODBC, PHP, and JDBC.

trans-unit.source: In the source code you pasted, replace the [Your_Connection_String] placeholder with the connection string, and be sure to replace your_password_here in that string with your actual password.
trans-unit.target: In the source code you pasted, replace the [Your_Connection_String] placeholder with the connection string, and be sure to replace your_password_here in that string with your actual password.

trans-unit.source: To build and run your application, click DEBUG > Start Debugging
trans-unit.target: To build and run your application, click DEBUG > Start Debugging

trans-unit.source: The program prints the query results to the console window.
trans-unit.target: The program prints the query results to the console window.
